channel.title: Sous Vide Tools on Cooking
channel.description: Recent content in Sous Vide Tools on Cooking

item.title: Sous Vide Item: Ping Pong Balls?
item.description: Ping Pong Balls To Retain Heat Went to the Dollar Tree near my house and bought 8 packages of 6 balls. These trap the water from evaporating on long cooks. It has so far been extremely effective. Picture 1
